{"url":"https://www.voicecharterschool.org","name":" VOICE Charter School","description":"
This is site is to grow awareness of VOICE Charter School in the community, to help attract potential hires, family, and donors, and to act as a portal for current families for certain data and information.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/59c31631a9db09b82ad732b7/t/59d4ecb429f187499cb906b9/1587499343542/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

div.h2: IMPORTANT UPDATE: VOICE Charter School buildings are currently CLOSED. Our 12th St. office is open by appointment only.
div.p: Welcome to VOICE Charter School! We are an elementary and middle school located in Long Island City currently serving over 680 students. We combine rigorous academics with daily instruction in choral singing, encouraging creative and critical thinking while improving academic performance.
Open Meetings Notice - Due to COVID-19 all board meetings are virtual. Click here for more information.
